GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/topics.description: adds a topic to the database

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

POST /api/articles.description: adds an article to the database and responds with the added comment

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with requested article id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments with requested article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to database and responds with added comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates votes for article with requested article id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: removes comment with requested comment id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object with the requested username

GET /api/articles?sort_by.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by specified column

GET /api/articles?order.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by date created in descending unless ascending is specified in the query

GET /api/articles?topic.description: serves an array of articlec filtered by topic
